pages.title: Ghast Trap
pages.text: Namesake, it appears that this device's sole purpose is to trap Ghasts. It seems giving this thing a Redstone signal does nothing, perhaps it needs some sort of power source?

It is just what I'm after! If I can kill enough of these weak Ghastlings around one of these traps, it will gain the energy from those killed. There is a quiet pinging noise that emanates from this device, and if it is loud enough, I can trigger a Redstone signal to execute this device and wrench Ghasts from the sky, sucking up their life, too.
